description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.6M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Govan Brown Associates. The average
  contract duration was 1.99 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.7M. The longest
  contract was 3.48 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.8M.
